活动-飞虫集群: 落在树上，它们的重量压断了细枝 Alighting on a tree, their weight causing twigs to snap
嗡嗡作响，嘈杂刺耳的声音充斥所有耳朵 Buzzing cacophonously, the sound filling all ears
突然改变方向，仿佛受到某种指令的驱使 Changing direction suddenly, as if by some command
正在啃噬一匹马的皮 Chewing their way through the hide of a Horse
围绕着一处池塘盘旋，一名侏儒正在屏息潜水 Circling a pool, where a Gnome holds her breath
在空中形成一团黑暗、波动的云状物 Clouding the air in a dark, undulating mass
正在为一只洞穴熊的尸体建立殖民地 Colonizing the carcass of a Cave Bear
以其贪婪的胃口破坏果树 Damaging Fruit Trees with their rapacious appetite
在空中编织出复杂而同步的图案 Darning the air in intricate, synchronized patterns
降落在强盗正在烤制的野猪上 Descending on a Bandit's roasting Boar
摧毁苦行僧的食物供应 Devastating the Food Supplies of a Dervish
随强风飘荡，朝一处定居点移动 Drifting on a stiff breeze, toward a settlement
围绕着闪烁的火把飞舞 Fluttering around a flickering Torch
正在哥布林垃圾坑中大快朵颐 Gorging on a Goblin Garbage Pit
在空心原木附近盘旋，那里藏着一位魔法使用者 Hovering near a Hollow Log, where a Magic User hides
对突然的声响发出威胁性的嗡嗡声 Humming menacingly in response to a sudden sound
迁移寻找食物，已将某片区域啃食殆尽 Migrating in search of food, after stripping an area bare
在烟雾逐渐消散中徘徊，显得有些晕头转向 Milling about, somewhat stunned by fading Smoke
在浸水的衣柜内筑巢 Nesting inside a water-logged Armoire
困扰一位失宠的圣骑士 Plaguing a Paladin, fallen from grace
从一处出奇狭小的裂缝中蜂拥而出 Pouring out of a surprisingly tiny crack
群体为争夺配偶而发出响亮共鸣声 Resonating loudly as the throng competes for mates
落在盾牌上，将其抛光的光泽变得暗淡 Settling on a Shield, polished to a shine, to dull its glow
正在疯狂地叮咬一只巨大的蟾蜍 Stinging a frantic Giant Toad
沿途剥光每一株植物的茎秆 Stripping every stalk of plant life in their path
围绕着石棺，仿佛被其吸引 Surrounding a stone Sarcophagus, as if drawn to it
在喧嚣的漩涡中盘旋，堵住了一道拱门 Swirling in a vociferous vortex, blocking an archway
俯冲而下，在散发着恶臭的湿泥中饮水 Swooping down to drink in stinking, wet mud
在光秃秃的树枝间无休止地饥饿觅食 Unceasingly hungering among bare Tree branches
围绕着一具腐烂的双足飞龙盘旋飞舞 Whirling around a decaying Wyvern
猛烈地推进，碾过沿途的一切障碍 Aggressively marching over anything in their way
钻入一具静止的木乃伊体内 Burrowing into a motionless Mummy
正搬运一只死鹿 Carrying away a dead Deer
它们在颚中碾碎旧骨时发出咔嗒声 Chattering as they pulverize old bone in their mandibles
正在清理地面上每一丝碎屑 Cleaning every trace of detritus from the Floor
顽固地紧抓着一根垂下的绳索 Clinging doggedly to a dangling Rope
聚集在一位咒法师的尸体上 Crowding on a Conjurer's corpse
从腐烂的Rhagodessa下迅速飞出 Darting out from beneath a rotting Rhagodessa
填满一座被亵渎的圣水池，如同心脏般跳动 Filling a desecrated Font, beating like a Heart
迫使大地精猎手进行有序撤退 Forcing Hobgoblin Hunters into organized retreat
聚集在一群食尸鬼留下的腐尸残骸周围 Gathering in the charnel wake of a pack of Ghouls
正在啃咬椅子上的软垫 Gnawing through the cushions on a chair
在你眼前不断膨胀并增大体积 Growing and swelling in size before your very eyes
聚集在一处废弃的鹰身女妖巢穴之上 Huddling atop an abandoned Harpy Nest
入侵整个区域，除了一个由符文环绕的圆圈之外 Invading an entire area, apart from a Circle lined with Runes
从幽魂口中蜂拥而出 Issuing forth from the mouth of a Wight
争夺在巨型老鼠身上的最佳进食位置 Jostling for prime dining position on a Giant Rat
威胁一只被困的火甲虫 Menacing a cornered Fire Beetle
正啃食一只沉睡的食尸鬼的脚趾 Nibbling on the toes of a Sleeping Thoul
在房间里翻倒家具，随着它们蜂拥而至 Overturning furniture as they swell across a room
正从炽热的绿色粘液下方经过 Passing beneath a sizzling Green Slime
仅追逐特定信仰的个体 Pursuing only those of a particular Faith
从上方裂缝中无情地蜂拥而出 Relentlessly surging from a crack above
在油瓶点燃后四散飞逃 Scattering after a flask of Oil ignites
在一张巨大的石像表面停歇 Settling on the surface of a massive Stone Face
它们降落之处皆留下带有恶臭的污渍 Staining everywhere they land with a noxious odor
疯狂地发出令人发狂的刺耳鸣叫声 Stridulating wildly at a volume that is maddening
在一条巨蛇扭动的身体上密集蠕动 Teeming on the flailing body of a Giant Snake
围绕着一位拥有复眼的德鲁伊密集飞舞 Thronging around a Druid with faceted Eyes
以呼应与回应的方式向同伴吹哨发出警告 Whistling a warning in call-and-response fashion to their flock
